item.title: DC-3 of DC Series(vulnhub)
item.description: I enjoyed DC-2’s Tom & Jerry theme! It showed us the concept of credential reuse and weak passwords, along with the wordpress and SUID exploits/abuses. Anyways, now onto DC-3.2 aka DC-3! Dropdown to see DC-3's quick overview DC-3 is another purposely built vulnerable lab with the intent of gaining experience in the world of penetration testing. As with the previous DC releases, this one is designed with beginners in mind, although this time around, there is only one flag, one entry point and no clues at all.
item.dc:creator: Matt Raupfer
